title: Pochereth-hazzebaim, Pochereth of Zebaim
content:
POCHERETH-HAZZEBAIM, POCHERETH OF ZEBAIM

The head of a family of Solomon’s servants who returned from the exile in Babylon with Zerubbabel (Ezra 2:57; Nehemiah 7:59). Some translations, like the King James Version, write the name as “Pochereth of Zebaim,” treating Zebaim as a place name.
